00184    // inline methods 
00185  
00186    /* 
00187    * Calculate repulsive potential energy for particle of type i.
00188    *
00189    * 7.905694 = 25/sqrt(10), which is the negative of the minimum of the
00190    * unshifted 9-3 potential.
00191    */
00192    inline double BoxExternal::energy(double d, int type) const
00193    {
00194       if (d < cutoff_) {
00195          double r3i;
00196          r3i = d * d * d;
00197          if (r3i < 0.129615*sigmaCb_) r3i = 0.129615 * sigmaCb_;
00198          r3i = sigmaCb_ / r3i;
00199          return coeff_ * (r3i*(r3i*r3i - 7.5) + 7.905694);
00200       } else {
00201          return 0.0;
00202       }
00203    }
00204    
00205    /* 
00206    * Calculate external potential energy for a single atom.
00207    */
00208    inline double BoxExternal::energy(const Vector& position, int type) const
00209    {
00210       double d, totalEnergy;
00211       Vector halfL = boundaryPtr_->lengths();
00212       halfL *= 0.5;
00213       totalEnergy = 0.0;
00214       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00215          d = position[i];
00216          if (d > halfL[i]) d = halfL[i] + halfL[i] - d;
00217             totalEnergy += energy(d, type);
00218       }
00219       return totalEnergy;
00220    }
00221    
00222    /* 
00223    * Calculate force for a particle as a function of distance to boundary.
00224    */
00225    inline double BoxExternal::forceScalar(double d, int i) const
00226    {
00227       if (d < cutoff_) {
00228          double r3i;
00229          r3i = d * d * d;
00230          if (r3i < 0.129615 * sigmaCb_) r3i = 0.129615 * sigmaCb_;
00231          r3i = sigmaCb_ / r3i;
00232          return coeff_ * (9.0*r3i*r3i - 22.5) * r3i / d;
00233       } else {
00234          return 0.0;
00235       }
00236    }
00237 
00238    /* 
00239    * Calculate external force for a single atom.
00240    */
00241    inline void 
00242    BoxExternal::getForce(const Vector& position, int type, Vector& force) const
00243    {
00244       double d = position[2];
00245       double scalarf;
00246       Vector halfL = boundaryPtr_->lengths();
00247       halfL *= 0.5;
00248       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00249          d = position[i];
00250          if (d > halfL[i]) {
00251             d = halfL[i] + halfL[i] - d;
00252             scalarf = forceScalar(d, type);
00253             force[i] = -scalarf;
00254          } else {
00255             scalarf = forceScalar(d, type);
00256             force[i] = scalarf;
00257          }
00258       }
00259    }
